lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Seeing this site inspired me to loan, I'm just getting started, but will try and help someone every time I get paid. It makes me happy to see so many people trying to make a difference, what an amazing concept.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing, advertising and branding for a number of clients from spirits companies, automotive brands, technology and healthcare. Just trying to keep our work positive.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer in Azerbaijan. I saw the use and influence of microcredit on small business owners and farmers. I know how much they need it and deserve financial help all across the world.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others and help those less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those "out there" in the world get on their feet and live more productive, less fear-filled and desperate lives.
lenders.occupational_info: As a social worker, I helped adults, children and families solve their relationship and mental health problems.  I helped them to believe in themselves.

lenders.name: andrea
lenders.loan_because: I have learned being disabled has made me slow down and see life differently

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the financing business.

lenders.name: Morgan and Kate
lenders.loan_because: Because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Morgan makes maps and Kate teaches children.

lenders.name: Preet
lenders.loan_because: giving is better than receiving
lenders.occupational_info: Work means less to me than helping people

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the resident manager of Thorne Swift Nature Preserve on Lake Michigan's Little Travers Bay, along with making and selling bows and arrows in the off season.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: A walk in the park compared to most.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure students do what they are expected to do.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Micro Finance
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people's investments

lenders.name: kathryn
lenders.loan_because: your business ideas and goals matter to your families and communities and i believe you will be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: my work pertains to chronic disease prevention

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: America is the land of excess and I want my children to understand that they are very lucky to live here and have what they do.  I want them to see that anyone can make a difference with a little effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I am able to stay at home and raise my children.  My husband is a General Manager for a major golf course and I wait tables part-time at a restaurant in Boston.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: it's the best investment I could possibly make! "Be the change you wish you to see in the world"
lenders.occupational_info: Student and NGO Worker. I study how NGOs (like Kiva) operate and work for a foundation that invests in arts NGOs in the mid-west.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to better their lives.

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping those who need a hand, not a hand out, especially to those who live in the developing countries where many many hands are needed.  This is my small way of serving others.  As a wise man once said, "the greatest is the one who serves."  Aloha!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to do what ever humanly possible to rid myself of all malice and all deceit, hypocrisy, envy, and slander of every kind.  I believe that true justice is mercy and compassion.

lenders.name: Raegan
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do!

lenders.name: Amir
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and know how difficult it is to attract financing in U.S.  I can understand how much more difficult it is for someone in the 3rd world (I was born in one) to do the same thing.
lenders.occupational_info: Composer and music educator

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to people and communities in need.  I have no doubt the money will make a much greater impact in small communities with minimal resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the United Kingdom to help oversee various implementation projects across my company's businesses in Europe.

lenders.name: John W
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make maps.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I think we can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We are all one family helping each other out.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I will be joining the Peace Corps next March and then headed to grad school.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: These people don't want a hand out, they want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Sue & Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's a GREAT way to help someone in need!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of AGI Solutions Inc. It is a Internet based Silkscreen & Flexo Printing Mfg.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: it is a awesome way to help strengthen businesses that benefit many people all over the world!

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: It reflects my values.

lenders.name: Debra, Jaz & Raj
lenders.loan_because: .........because we have been given the ability to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Heal and rejuvenate people through massage and generate electricity to make our lives easier.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I know how important it is to have the resources needed to start or grow a business.

lenders.name: Norton Aid
lenders.occupational_info:
We protect more people from more
online threats than anyone in the world

lenders.name: Eric and Elena
lenders.loan_because: it feels goooood... =)

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to live in a country where my daughter has every opportunity available to her.  Not everyone does, and this is something small we can do to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children in the school system to be more successful in the classroom environment.

lenders.name: Angie and Abby
lenders.loan_because: We have $25 and some people don't.  What more reason do we need?
lenders.occupational_info: Angie works with teenage girls with troubled pasts.  To help them survive better in the world.  Abby is a student.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: How could I not take a small risk on someone willing to work hard to make a better life.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people who are in need.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it makes the world a smaller place.  Also, microfinancing helps me to keep the pace of life here in perspective.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the goodness I've received.

lenders.name: Josh, Maxine & Noah
lenders.loan_because: We want our family to help others succeed.

lenders.name: Jan Schroeder
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in the principle of Pay It Forward.  Blessings that come into my life are paid forward to benefit others.  It's the right thing to do; it's the human thing to do.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I introduce programs to local governments that benefit their cities and residents.

lenders.name: Matt Parkins
lenders.loan_because: I'm passionate about micro-financing people out of poverty!
lenders.occupational_info: Coding

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the power to make a good life for themselves.

lenders.name: Greg & Julie
lenders.loan_because: we can and believe in the spirit of Rachel Beckwith that we each may make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach the future.  We have an opportunity to open the eyes of young students to the needs of those in other parts of the world and have them compare it to their own life experience.  We hope to make the world a better place by planting the seeds in the minds and hearts of our future.

lenders.name: DJV
lenders.loan_because: I understand and appreciate the hard work in building a business.  I want to help other entrepreneurs who are not as lucky as I have been so far.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet marketing entrepreneur

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!  :o)

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help at one or more times in their lives.  I've been fortunate to have help when I needed it, so I'm happy to help others when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an affordable housing apartment building in south Minneapolis.  I strive to make sure people and their families have a safe, clean and healthy community to come home to. It is my responsibility to make sure that they are connected to the resources that will ensure they can keep their homes for a long time.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a revolutionary concept that offers a tangible solution to eliminating, or at least drastically reducing world poverty. Kiva.org allows me a means with which to loan, a possibility I previously did not know how to implement; knowing about the grandeurs of microfinance is one thing, but being able to actually take advantage of its' genius is quite another. So for that, thank you!!!

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I made a loan in my mother and mother-in-laws names.  When the loans are paid back I will reinvest the money in 2 more woman.  This way, the lives of the 2 women who were so important in my life will go on forever helping other women around the world.

lenders.name: Mark & Jenn Gonnelly
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate in our life, that we would be truly selfish if we didn't share with others.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.occupation: Clean Energy Advisor for leading solar energy company
lenders.loan_because: We are all neighbors on this Earth and we need to take care of each other and lift each other to greater heights.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe education is the key to opening our minds and hearts. We also need to care for our plant and understand sustainability and clean energy will bring a brighter future.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone the opportunity to create a better life, a sense of self-worth, confidence and accomplishment.  I want them to be able to live a more comfortable life and to be able to dream of the future.  This is more than a loan, this is the opportunity to change lives, one by one.

lenders.name: Carlton
lenders.loan_because: I want to helpful.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retiring I was responsible for putting together  people places and things to make justice happen.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to get out of poverty if they do the work necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: I make educated guesses about the future direction of prices of stocks.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with tools that make measurements for oil and gas wells while they are being drilled.

lenders.name: David J. Bianco
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: People all over the world, in all walks of life, should have just and fair access to credit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a small business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: we are able to

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides such an amazing opportunity to feel connected with the global community and do good things

lenders.name: St. Mary's
lenders.loan_because: we represent  St. Mary's commitment to social justice and support of the UN Millenium Development Goals.
lenders.occupational_info: We are members of St. Mary's Episcopal Church located in St. Paul, Minnesota.

lenders.name: Evelyn
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I can make a small difference at the grass roots level.

lenders.name: Vicky & Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Shouldn't everyone have the opportunity to improve their life regardless of where they find themselves due to birth?

lenders.name: tom & deborah
lenders.loan_because: what the world needs is a different kind of action hero

lenders.name: leon
lenders.loan_because: I care!!! I want the chain to continue...I am small alone but as a chain we can make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I run a clothing store.

lenders.name: Mitch & Kelley
lenders.loan_because: We succeeded because someone took a chance on us. Things were tough at first but through hard work and perseverance we have built a successful business and we have opened our second location.  I like to lend to others trying to succeed in food service like me because I know first hand just how hard it is to move up in this business without a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I own & manage two sandwich shops and my wife is an emergency trauma nurse in the ER of a hospital. I bake the bread & meats, slice and cook every sandwich fresh to order. Other duties include maintaining the books, insurance, and overseeing our employees just to name a few things. My wife helps those who are severly injured and brought to the emergency room.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it is so gratifying to see a small contribution make a significant difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Shiloh
lenders.loan_because:
I am fortunate and blessed-I have the means to assist- 
I like the sustainability angle of the program and believe in those who have a plan to better their families lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
Graduate Student- looking to enter a acedemically challenging 
graduate school in 2013! :) Accepted and excited to be attending Hollins University in Roanoke, VA:) Looking to graduate in 2012 and attend grad school/law school-on target

lenders.name: Holly Ann
lenders.loan_because: sometimes others can do more with my dollar than i can.
lenders.occupational_info: loving children, reading books

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I believe - Help is for people who want it - Not people who need it - work hard think positive and good things will happen

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves & has potential to make something of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I will be a college graduate in May. Then in September, I will be starting graduate school at NYU for my masters in Elementary & Special Education.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I drive semi trucks in america.

lenders.name: Lori

lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university, and do volunteer work in my home community.

lenders.name: Ilan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy doing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop technology that help companies manage their Online Marketing efforts more effectively. We deliver greater Return on investment for your Marketing Dollar.

lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help others when I have been blessed with so much.
lenders.occupational_info: Civil enginner turned stay at home mom.

lenders.name: Tim and Rebecca

lenders.occupational_info: Tim works for the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency.  Rebecca volunteers at our kids' school.

lenders.name: Taylor & Rob
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  We have been so blessed, we just wish to give back & this is truly a wonderful way of doing it.

lenders.name: yigal
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do. Anytime you can promote goodness in a world that desperately needs it you've taken a step forward for humanity.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 4th grade teacher in Northern Canada.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I am learning about MNC's and the unbound debt that can result due to mistakes made on our (industrialized countries) part in the past.  As a result of the said "race to the bottom", I feel the need to do something to change the current conditions in the world.  I know that one by one is the only way to change the world now.  So it's high time I contribute!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student at a northern Washington university who is working toward a degree in communications and political science.  I am aspiring to join a non-governmental organization such as Oxfam and to help the world as best I can.

lenders.name: Niki
lenders.loan_because: I have my own small business and know how hard it can be to get started or make upgrades.  I love the idea of helping someone else in the same position I was or could be in the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a private massage therapy practice where I help my clients deal with stress,pain management, injury prevention and recovery.  I am also going to school to complete prerequisites for medical school.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people be productive and believe in generating good karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people fix their technology problems.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  Used to be "Think globally, Act locally", now it's "Think globally, Act globally."  Thanks Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: Your worth is measured by how much you help others

lenders.name: Adriana
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so many blessings in my life I want to do the same for others.

lenders.name: High School Friends
lenders.loan_because: We decided to make a loan this year, in lieu of purchasing Christmas gifts for each other this holiday season.
lenders.occupational_info: We have all known each other and been girlfriends for over 22 years.  Some of us are / have been entrepreneurs and would like to support other entrepreneurs in developing countries

lenders.name: The Super Team
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help eliminate poverty and help people.

lenders.name: Jeff Hardwick
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to set an example for the rest of the developed world.
lenders.occupational_info: Not to feed others, but to help them to catch their own fish.

lenders.name: Mattness
lenders.loan_because: The greatest achievement is selflessness.The greatest quality is seeking to serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: The greatest magic is transmuting the passions.

lenders.name: lealani
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is good to help others, hoping they will try to do the same. I believe that if you help other people they will see the good and do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to draw, paint, etc.

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.loan_because: I founded my own company and know that it takes both hard work and support to make it work, but the rewards are worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help individuals and companies build businesses.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a push in the right direction. I believe in people and their ability to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer software.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I'm still young and yet  I have every chance in this world for success in life. There are so many people out there without that opprotunity. It's unfair that I should be so blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm taking a year off after high school to save some money for my post-secondary education. I work as a cook in an English Pub.

lenders.name: Sarah Mae
lenders.loan_because: it seems like such a fantastic way to connect with others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children to teach them  to speak.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: a girl I like told me I should.  And because helping people is good.

lenders.name: Anders
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, that want to start or develope their own buisiness, so that they can have an interesting future, and improve their  and theirs families life quality!
lenders.occupational_info:
I have been working in my own buisiness, (industrial equipment) for
 many years, and I am now reaping the good result of it!!

lenders.name: Rosie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.  I am happy to help foster entrepreneurship rather than just 'giving'. In this small way, I hope I am helping to create a better world for all of us.

lenders.name: Milo
lenders.loan_because: I think it is one of the best ways to make higher living standards in afrika and other poor areas - So if YOU read this then please do lend some of your money to people who are in great need.
lenders.occupational_info: I create 3D industrial product models in a sales configurator.

lenders.occupational_info: Chief Operating Officer, PATH

lenders.name: Malcolm & Lauren
lenders.loan_because: We can help peole who are trying to help themselves

lenders.name: Jun Bucao
lenders.loan_because: I  feel good giving or helping others and for my children to learn to give or help others always.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help fight fight poverty and bring greater equity to the world in order to empower those who would otherwise be unable to work towards their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the development of the nervous system.

lenders.name: Heinz-Jürgen
lenders.loan_because: it´s not a problem for me.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I am so happy that we can! We all need to be global citizens!

lenders.name: Jay & Matt
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  We are all humans and helping each other makes my heart sing.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both theatrical stage managers.  We live in NYC and work all around the world manageing broadway musicals.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and it is God's wish.
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding, enriching, and challenging

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: We have always believed in the spirit of the entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: We help local business owners get their message online, heard and understood throughout the world.

lenders.name: Eric & Christine
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Kiva seems like a good way to help out individual people instead of sending it into a vague pool of money where it might or might not get to the people you want it to go to. I really like this concept and you can follow the progress of the people you help out and if successful really makes everyone feel like they've accomplished something. Not many things in life do that.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lenders.name: jeanene
lenders.loan_because: My friends and I have been blessed.  We are all mothers and daughters who understand the desire of a better life for our families. This is my 50th birthday gift from my friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student again at 50.  I have gone back to school to get a Masters Degree to help people.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that these hard working people are not asking for a handout, but rather a helping hand. Thanks Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell annuities to financial professionals in the United States. Annuities are insurance products that provide people guaranteed income in their retirement years.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in our local hospital.  I am a mother of two military sons  who are both married and I  have a great husband.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to be able to make such a big difference with even small loans, and to feel connected with people on the other parts of the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise awareness and support for important issues and causes.

lenders.name: Jim and Deb
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: Banker (Jim) and Director of Operations (Deb)

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to give.  I am very grateful for the abundance I have in my life.  Not everybody has the access to food, shelter, clothing, and education that I have.  I hope my loans help others to exceed where they could not before.  Best of luck and lots of love!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently teaching conversational English in Japan.

lenders.name: Team D
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help entrepreneurs achieve their goals of starting or expanding their businesses.  We really believe in the concept of micro-lending and wanted to support it.  This idea started as part of a group project for one of our classes.
lenders.occupational_info: Our team - comprised of 4 members - works in various fields such as health care and financial services.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I almost cried when I saw the Kiva segment on CNN...  I have more than I deserve.  These people work harder than I, and can hardly feed their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Land Developer in Southwest Florida ( I sell homes in gated communities).  I spend all of my free time competing and training as a Triathlete.

lenders.name: William Hite
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping hard working people and their families climb out of poverty and helping them realize some of their dreams.  I am fortunate to be an American, and would like to share some of my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: To help
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university, helping environmental scientists manage and spend their grant funds.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I can. Why would I not?

lenders.name: Gracie
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling I get in my stomach when I give back to someone. Giving is the best present anyone can ever get.

lenders.name: Scott and Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: it is such a wonderful opportunity to share in personal growth of people all over the world.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help at some time in their life.  It gives me great pleasure to be able to help--even though the amount may be small.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for many doctors, helping them by writing letters, making appointments, and arranging tests for their patients.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a little leg-up, and hard work can result in success and a great sense of accomplishment. Everyone deserves the opportunity to better themselves and their community.

lenders.name: Joao
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way I can help those with great needs
lenders.occupational_info: help physicians treat patients with heart disease

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: I spent 6 months volunteering in Ecuador and traveled in Peru for two weeks.  I feel this is a great way to continue helping people in South America get ahead in life.

lenders.name: Eleni
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Mikkel Breum
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinancing can be much better than traditional aid, as it recognises the recievers as people with pride and motivation, instead of as clients and beggars. Just like you would normally lend your collegues or neighbour instead of giving; for just the same reason. Another important issue for me is, that this way the money is  distributed through grassroot organisations, so its harder for corrupt people in power to steal it from the people it was intended for (at least I'd like to think so). Finally I believe, that people committing and doing something instead of just talking about it, is the only way for this world to ever get better.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help others in a personal meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a consultant for the insurance industry.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: talk type talk type talk type

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: it's a phenomenal way to get money to the people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with electric companies to help keep the lights on!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Ican.
lenders.occupational_info: Pretending

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the fact that these people are willing to do what it takes to better their lives and those of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: General bookkeeping and income tax preparation. Also sell on Ebay.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me and I in turn want to give back.  That's what its all about.  I thank my neice for letting me know about Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital lab. We help the Doctor find out what germ is making you sick and what medication will help make you well.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: it is a joy to help someone improve their life

lenders.name: Many Blessings
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate, the least we can do is help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse, married to a veterinarian.  We have four kids and numerous critters.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it's an easy way to make a big difference. I especially find it important to support women who are trying to start or expand their businesses because it allows them to be self-reliant.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I'm lending this money to derserving people in the name of my grandchildren. Tanner, Jared, Harlie and Brooke, as an extra Hanukkah gift, in hopes it will teach them the value of charity and the thrill that comes from helping other families in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm best known for the miniature animals I create out of clay, paint, fake fur and/or feathers. They are in private collections and museums. I built this home based business by myself  over 30 years ago.

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hospitals reduce cost and improve clinical outcomes.

lenders.name: giandomenico
lenders.loan_because: i have the possibility and i trust in microcredit as a way for a better world

lenders.name: The Skelton Family
lenders.loan_because: As a family this year we are making donations instead of exchanging christmas gifts.  We hope to spread our gifts around the world this year!

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.occupation: Program Director for a public policy nonprofit

lenders.name: Forrest
lenders.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and he is fed for a day, teach a man to fish and he is fed for a lifetime, provide credit and training, he opens a seafood stand and feeds a village."

“The significant problems we have cannot be solved at the same level of thinking with which we created them.”  -  Albert Einstein
lenders.occupational_info: I am a construction engineer working wherever the world takes me.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I get to volunteer to various things, working for food pantries, building homes with Habitat for Humanity, etc.

lenders.name: Roger & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We are thankful to be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info:
I build & repair the interiors of  boats.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I build and repair boats.  I am mostly retired now.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I believe the establishment sometimes makes it hard for some to take their first steps towards success.
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure employees of large companies are able to get information about their retirement and healthcare benefits

lenders.name: Antonio & Giancarlo
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity and my son and I want to help others, even if we do not know them personally.
lenders.occupational_info:
"The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity." - Tolstoy

May you succeed in your businesses and prosper.  My son and I are honored to be of service to you.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I feel a moral resposibility to help others in need.

lenders.name: Ludovic Trautmann
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I learn people how to learn.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with designing and manufacturing satellite products.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Better than charity.

lenders.name: The Bush Family
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Dale & Callie
lenders.loan_because: We want to help spread our good fortune

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I would love to help others as others have helped me in a time of need.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a supervisor for a Hi Tech company 'Sagem Morpho Inc."  which does livescan fingerprinting for background checks.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the medically underserved.

lenders.name: Elin & René

lenders.occupational_info: Elin works in an insurance company and René is working in a office that administrate both temporary and permanent jobs.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want women all over the world to have the same opportunities I've had in developing a career and business
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their kitchens and bathrooms, so they can enjoy their homes even more than they already do.

lenders.name: Pruski-Clawson Family
lenders.loan_because: we have such great
lenders.occupational_info: Our family has diverse occupations:  salesmen, attorney, homemaker, retired, school children

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I know how much a loan means to an Entrepreneur. I feel as though I can truly help those with passion in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small manufacturing company in San Francisco, CA that employs 35 people

lenders.name: Aussie School Friends
lenders.loan_because: We feel connected to a common purpose, even though we now live all over the world.

lenders.name: Mark Henry
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I make wine

lenders.name: Tom & Lynn
lenders.loan_because: l believe the type of micro loans provided through agencies like Kiva are the most effective means of encouraging economic development at the grass roots level.  The success of individual entrepreneurs has a ripple effect in that it can inspire others to pursue their economic goals.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: It's good!

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: this is the best medium to have a direct impact on one entrepreneur, his/her family, his/her town and the greater world...
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own insurance company in 2003.

lenders.name: Susan & Bud
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together...  It's one of our ways to reach out from a small town in SW Michigan to help others...

lenders.name: S. Kent
lenders.loan_because: When I'm thinking about buying something I really don't *have* to have or going out to a nice lunch when I have food at home that's perfectly good, I come home and come here occasionally ... and feel much better knowing that money is going to something that really is necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to help the best healthcare products get out to the public faster

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get the funds necessary to start or run a small business.  I also loan money because I believe in helping others, that is what I was taught to do... you never know when it might be you in need....
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer technician who believed in myself so much that I started a small business of my own doing on-site computer services for private clients and small businesses. I fix computers, build them and service them in many different ways. I LOVE what I do and love helping others, that is why I do it.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are always looking for ways to help others improve their quality of life. Thank you KIVA for your innovative thinking and an easy-to-use website!

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that need money for their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I got to school to learn all that I can learn.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an electrical engineer.  The company I work for specializes in making movable parts of buildings

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I have worked with microfinance projects in Africa and have witnessed first hand the difference that each dollar can make.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work hard to improve themselves, help their families, and learn to help others.  Our world is one large community, and all the world's people are members of my community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from formal work, but I do some substitute teaching, I enjoy gardening, and I work with wood to make toys and other small items to give as gifts.

lenders.name: Godfrey
lenders.occupation: Ex Pro Soccer Player / Venture Capital Partner
lenders.loan_because: For each Kiva entrepreneur, the fruits of their success are likely to be spent in their own community which in turn will continue to benefit that community. How cool is that!
lenders.occupational_info: I used to kick a soccer ball around for a living, now I help fund businesses.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poor
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very interesting.I get to meet travellers from all acrooss the world and hear different stories of their cultures.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: A simple act can change a life, and life changed can change the world.

lenders.name: Rob, Tami, and Nate
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are called to share what has been given to us.
lenders.occupational_info: We raise Corriente Cattle.  They are a Mexican breed of cattle, similar to the ones from Spain used in bull fighting.  In America they are used in rodeos for team roping and steer wrestling.  We also have a few horses.

lenders.name: Piam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I  can
lenders.occupational_info: one that is In progress - still

lenders.name: Rosa
lenders.loan_because: I want to give more to people less fortunate.  I work for the US Navy overseas and witnessed how poverty strictened these people really are. I'm not rich, but I know I don't need $25.00.
lenders.occupational_info: I allow people to talk to each other through a T.V.  I'm a Video Teleconference Technician.  I just engineered a teleconference that our own US President Bush conducted.  I was given a Letter of Appreciation for making sure the video conference went flawless:)

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: Our family would like to help others around the world who are trying to make their dreams come true!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner of a consulting firm.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what God has blessed me with.  I also want others to succeed - one person, one life at a time...maybe, just maybe, we can help.  Let's change this world for the better and be a more God worthy people.

lenders.name: Liam and Aidan
lenders.loan_because: People around the world need help and we feel that is our responsibility to help them.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It a good feeling to help others run a small business and keep it growing.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy learning about people worldwide and contributing to their success

lenders.name: kera
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need and I want to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my kids and volunteer in school.

lenders.name: dkd
lenders.loan_because: Because I try to live by Gandhi's mantra, "Be the change you wish to see in the World." & Bono's "It's not charity; It's justice."

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to and the knowledge and conscience  to understand that I can make a difference in someone else's life
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to gain the health care skills in school that I will be able to utilize for those who don't have access to adequate health care

lenders.name: Cecil
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Vladimir
lenders.loan_because: Offering working capital to less fortunate people is an attempt of redeeming them from their hardships.
lenders.occupational_info: Originate, and structure trade finance, and commodity finance-related transactions.

lenders.name: Romeo
lenders.loan_because: I love people.

lenders.name: Buffy and Alan
lenders.loan_because: We believe in you!

lenders.name: Carolan
lenders.loan_because: it supports people in a real way that encourages self reliance and self confidence.

lenders.loan_because: I believe Kiva can be an important and fun part of ending poverty and helping people maximize their economic potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an economist with a number of years working in commercial banking. I was a Kiva Fellow in 2009.

lenders.name: Nadia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people who are more hardworking and resilient than I am.  I would like to give them access to resources that we are so fortunate to have in my part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Scientist

lenders.name: Niberkanitz
lenders.loan_because: All great accomplishments require sacrifice and a helping hand from time to time. If the contribution I make to someone in need can help them realize their dreams, that is the greatest gift of all.

lenders.name: Myriam
lenders.occupational_info: My work : I treat physical problems resulting from illness, injury, disability or ageing thanks to manual therapy, movement, exercise.

lenders.name: cathy

lenders.name: Edgar

lenders.name: Gay

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.occupational_info: I create my own websites. :)

lenders.occupational_info: I have the world's most important job--I am a teacher. I teach middle school science, and I love it.

lenders.name: juan

lenders.loan_because: We like helping others who are working to make their lives better in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I like to watch my investments grow. Everyone by their very being has a right not only to believe in hope but to experience its metamorphosis into something more.  If it were not for the kind gifts and belief in me by others, I myself would not have the means to participate in Kiva.org
lenders.occupational_info: I help to bring medicine from the "bench to bediside".   I work to make certain that medicine does what it is supposed to do.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to "pay it forward" and to give back to help others. I feel good knowing others can improve their lives with my help.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: The bankers of the world will not
